'''August, 30 2007 meeting Minutes'''

'''Weekly Meeting of the New Mexico Ubuntu LoCo'''

'''Members Present''' 
* David Thomas dthomasdigital
* Eric Kriger gcleric
* David Torres
* Igor Derdov

Plus I noticed a few people looking over our shoulders at all the brown goodness that is Ubuntu!

'''Others Present'''
* talked to some people on IRC from other LoCo's
* some lurkers on IRC but no one chimed in

'''Proceedings'''

Meeting called to order at 7:00pm by Member David Thomas

'''Topics Discussed''' 

What a great time we had at the Flying Star. Good food a few beers and some cheese cake. We talk about how we are organizing ourselves and how each of us use Ubuntu and Linux at home and in the work place. Eric had a great demo on VMware as well as other applications. We talked shop, and even played a short burst of Open Arena. David Thomas handed out the packets that we will be giving away for Software Freedom Day, also some stickers and other goodies. If you didn't go you missed out. See what we were up to here <nowiki>[[Flying_Star_Meet_and_Greet]]</nowiki>.

Meeting adjourned 8:45pm

'''Assessment of Meeting'''

The meeting was lively and full of information, we set a date for the next face to face 10/18/07 the Gutsy Gibbon release party!

Meeting minutes submitted by David Thomas
